remarks: The key property of projections: the sum of all the projections of ` A ` is ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjfval.p $e |- P = ( G dProj S ) $.
dpjid.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( G DProd S ) ) $.
dpjid $p |- ( ph -> A = ( G gsum ( x e. I |-> ( ( P ` x ) ` A ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d I x $.
$d P x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
